name: Jade & Bianca
description:
JADE & BIANCA

Jade, the older sibling, requested me to create a game for her, and here it is. 

Jade & Bianca is a small (5 minutes) and a charming game I created for my 2 lovely nieces.

This game was developed during a live stream (twitch.tv/prestoppc).

GAME OBJECTIVE

Jade needs to find Bianca and bring her back to the bed.

CONTROLS

Arrow keys - Move character

Space bar - Start the game

CONTENT

  • 5 x Levels
  • 1 x Baby sibling
  • 1 x Rattle item 
    • attracts baby sister
  • 1 x Baby bottle 
    • feeds baby sister
  • 1 x Yoyo 
    • destroys slime enemy
    • auto attacks
      • place the character holding the yoyo close to the enemy and it will throw it in that direction)
  • 1 x Slime enemy 
    • swallows baby sister

CREDITS
